scripts.build-electron: yarn esbuild preload.ts --external:electron --sourcemap --bundle --outfile=build/preload.js && yarn esbuild electron.ts --bundle --platform=node --sourcemap --external:electron --target=node10.4 --outfile=build/electron.js
scripts.build-web: yarn esbuild app.tsx --loader:.ts=tsx --loader:.js=jsx --bundle --sourcemap --outfile=build/web.js && cp index.html style.css build
scripts.start-electron: yarn build-web && yarn build-electron && yarn electron --trace-warnings build/electron.js
